patthana16.75:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ upādā dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.75:5.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.75:6.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.75:7.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ noupādā ca anidassanaappaṭighaṃ noupādā ca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.75:8.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa … pe … avigate aṭṭhārasa.
